name: Double Win Slots - FREE Las Vegas Casino Slot Machines Game
name_original: Double Win Slots - FREE Las Vegas Casino Slot Machines Game
description:
Download now! New players get 1,000,000 FREE BONUS CHIPS in the branding new FREE to play Casino app in the world!

In addition to traditional slot machines, Double Win Slots also introduces a uniquely designed daily challenge which you won’t find anywhere else. You can win up to 400,000,000 chips by beating other players! Unlike other casino games in which only few top players win the BIG prize, every one can win such big volume of chips in Double Win Slots by beating only two players. You may think “Are you kidding me?” Yes, you have only two rivals, beat them and take the prize, try it now!

Lovely assistants will help you in the daily challenge. While you play slot machines, your assistant will acquire experience. It will enter rage mode after level up, which will help you win the challenge greatly.

TOP FEATURES:

• Exciting daily challenges with huge payouts you won't find anywhere else!

• Level up bonus is HUGE and increases constantly with your level!

• Lovely assistants will help you beat other players and win the prize!

• Daily FREE bonus could win you up to 30,000,000 FREE Chips just for logging in!

• Challenge prize increases when you continue wins, it could be as HUGE as 400,000,000 chips!

The game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Any success in social casino gaming is not indicative of future success at real money gambling.
